Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Title: The Godfather
Description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, chaos ensues in Gotham City.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

Title: Inception
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Title: Goodfellas
Description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: The Green Mile
Description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

Title: Parasite
Description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

Title: Gladiator
Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Title: The Departed
Description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: The Prestige
Description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Title: Whiplash
Description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Title: The Lion King
Description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Title: The Usual Suspects
Description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

Title: Se7en
Description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Title: The Pianist
Description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Title: Back to the Future
Description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

Title: The Shining
Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Title: Alien
Description: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

Title: The Truman Show
Description: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a reality TV show.

Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Description: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

Title: Blade Runner
Description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

Title: The Social Network
Description: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Title: La La Land
Description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

Title: The Big Lebowski
Description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

Title: No Country for Old Men
Description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Title: The Sixth Sense
Description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

Title: Gone Girl
Description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

Title: The Revenant
Description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Title: Mad Max: Fury Road
Description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stockbroker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Title: Her
Description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

Title: Arrival
Description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

Title: Get Out
Description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

Title: Black Panther
Description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

Title: Joker
Description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

Title: The Irishman
Description: Hitman Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family in this acclaimed film from Martin Scorsese.

Title: Tenet
Description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

Title: Dune
Description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Description: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: Citizen Kane
Description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance.

Title: Casablanca
Description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Title: Schindler's List
Description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: 12 Angry Men
Description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

Title: The Good the Bad and the Ugly
Description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: Seven Samurai
Description: Farmers hire veteran samurai to protect their village from bandits in this action-packed classic.

Title: Psycho
Description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles \$40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

Title: The Graduate
Description: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

Title: Singin' in the Rain
Description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

Title: Some Like It Hot
Description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

Title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
Description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing the Allies plan to destroy it.

Title: Sunset Boulevard
Description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Title: Vertigo
Description: A former police detective juggles his obsession with a mysterious woman and the man who appears to be her husband.

Title: Amadeus
Description: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri.

Title: The Apartment
Description: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance ensue.

Title: Lawrence of Arabia
Description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united Arab tribes during World War I.

Title: Chinatown
Description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

Title: The Sting
Description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Description: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

Title: The Great Escape
Description: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

Title: Dr. Strangelove
Description: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Title: The Sound of Music
Description: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

Title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
Description: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run.

Title: The Exorcist
Description: When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

Title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Description: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

Title: 3 Idiots
Description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them 'idiots'.

Title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
Description: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

Title: Sholay
Description: After his family is murdered by a notorious bandit, a former police officer enlists the help of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

Title: Dangal
Description: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat trains his daughters Geeta and Babita to become India's first world-class female wrestlers.

Title: Andhadhun
Description: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

Title: Gangs of Wasseypur
Description: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

Title: Queen
Description: A Delhi woman from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

Title: PK
Description: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent behavior and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

Title: Bahubali
Description: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

Title: Mughal-e-Azam
Description: A 16th-century prince falls in love with a court dancer, sparking a bitter conflict with his emperor father.

Title: Anand
Description: A terminally ill man teaches those around him to live life to the fullest before his inevitable death.

Title: Black Friday
Description: A film about the investigations following the 1993 Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved.

Title: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
Description: Two friends' attempts to start a photography business lead them into uncovering political corruption, murder, and a bizarre conspiracy.

Title: Satya
Description: An innocent man is embroiled in underworld after being falsely charged and sets out to punish the perpetrators.

Title: Swades
Description: A successful Indian scientist returns to his homeland to find his nanny, and in the process rediscovers his roots.

Title: Udaan
Description: After being abandoned for eight years in boarding school, a 16-year-old returns home only to find an authoritarian father and a half-brother he never knew existed.

Title: The Lunchbox
Description: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life.

Title: Haider
Description: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

Title: Masaan
Description: Four lives intersect along the Ganges: a low-caste boy in love, a daughter ridden with guilt, a hapless father, and a spirited child.

Title: Newton
Description: A government clerk is sent on election duty to a Maoist-controlled area, where he must conduct free and fair voting despite the apathy of security forces and the looming threat of violence.

Title: Tumbbad
Description: A mythological horror story about a man who lusts for a hidden treasure in his ancestral village, but learns that greed comes at a terrible price.

Title: Soorarai Pottru
Description: Based on the life of Captain Gopinath, who founded Air Deccan, India's first low-cost airline.

Title: Sardar Udham
Description: A biopic detailing revolutionary Udham Singh's 21-year-long journey to avenge the 1919 Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

Title: The Kashmir Files
Description: A heart-wrenching narrative of the pain, suffering, and struggle of Kashmiri Pandits during the Kashmir Insurgency.

Title: Rashomon
Description: A heinous crime and its aftermath are recalled from differing points of view, revealing how subjective truth can be.

Title: North by Northwest
Description: A New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent and pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

Title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
Description: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

Title: Double Indemnity
Description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an investigator's suspicions.

Title: All About Eve
Description: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

Title: The Third Man
Description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

Title: Paths of Glory
Description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Title: The Manchurian Candidate
Description: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

Title: Barry Lyndon
Description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

Title: The Deer Hunter
Description: An in-depth examination of how the Vietnam War affects the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

Title: Raging Bull
Description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

Title: Fanny and Alexander
Description: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

Title: My Left Foot
Description: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

Title: The Lives of Others
Description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Title: Incendies
Description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

Title: Mother India
Description: A poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations, but one of them becomes a notorious bandit.

Title: Pyaasa
Description: A talented but indigent poet struggles for love and recognition in post-independence India.

Title: A Wednesday!
Description: A common man threatens to destroy Mumbai unless his demands are met, forcing the police to play a deadly game of cat and mouse.

Title: Kahaani
Description: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she meets denies having ever met him.

Title: Drishyam
Description: A man goes to extreme lengths to protect his family after they commit an unexpected crime.

Title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
Description: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation against militant launch pads in Pakistan-administered Kashmir.

Title: Thappad
Description: A slap from her husband prompts a woman to reevaluate her marriage and the societal norms that enable domestic abuse.

Title: Sherni
Description: An upright forest officer battles societal prejudice and systemic apathy to track down a man-eating tigress.

Title: Badhaai Ho
Description: A middle-aged couple's unexpected pregnancy creates chaos when their adult son struggles to come to terms with the situation.

Title: The Disciple
Description: A classical vocalist pursues excellence while struggling with the compromises of the modern music industry.

Title: Tokyo Story
Description: An aging couple visit their children in Tokyo, only to be treated with casual indifference in this poignant family drama.

Title: Wild Strawberries
Description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

Title: Persona
Description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their identities begin to merge in this psychological masterpiece.

Title: Stalker
Description: A guide leads two men through an enigmatic forbidden zone to reach a room that grants wishes, but the journey changes them.

Title: Come and See
Description: A teenage boy experiences the horrors of Nazi-occupied Belarus in this unflinching war film.

Title: A Separation
Description: A married couple faces a difficult decision that escalates into a legal battle exposing class tensions in Tehran.

Title: The Hunt
Description: A kindergarten teacher's life unravels after a child's innocent lie about inappropriate behavior spreads through his small community.

Title: Phantom Thread
Description: In 1950s London, a renowned dressmaker finds his carefully controlled life disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman.

Title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
Description: In 18th-century France, a painter develops an intimate relationship with the woman she's commissioned to paint.

Title: Minari
Description: A Korean-American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of their own American Dream, testing family bonds.

Title: The Father
Description: A man refuses assistance from his daughter as he ages and begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind, and reality.

Title: Drive My Car
Description: A grieving theater director forms an unexpected bond with his young chauffeur during a production of Uncle Vanya.

Title: Tár
Description: Set in the international world of classical music, the film explores the downfall of famed conductor Lydia Tár.

Title: The Banshees of Inisherin
Description: Two lifelong friends feud when one abruptly ends their relationship, with shocking consequences.

Title: RRR
Description: A fictional tale of two Indian revolutionaries and their journey away from home before fighting British colonial rule.
Actors: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.,Ram Charan,Ajay Devgn

Title: Do Bigha Zamin
Description: A poor farmer struggles to save his small plot of land from an unscrupulous landlord in post-independence India.

Title: Garam Hawa
Description: A Muslim family decides whether to stay in India or migrate to Pakistan during the Partition.

Title: Ardh Satya
Description: A conflicted police officer struggles with systemic corruption and his own violent tendencies.

Title: Ijaazat
Description: A chance meeting between divorced couple reveals unresolved feelings and past betrayals.

Title: Dil Chahta Hai
Description: Three childhood friends navigate adulthood, love, and heartbreak in contemporary Mumbai.

Title: Black
Description: The story of a deaf-blind girl and her teacher who transforms her life through education.

Title: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!
Description: A charismatic thief navigates Delhi's high society while evading the police in this satirical crime drama.

Title: Manorama Six Feet Under
Description: A small-town engineer gets entangled in a web of deceit while investigating an adultery case.

Title: Super Deluxe
Description: Four parallel stories intersect over one chaotic day in Chennai, exploring morality and redemption.
